nodes.text: A clone trooper accompanied Jedi Knight Nahdar Vebb, Jedi Master Kit Fisto and a squad of other clone troopers to the third moon of Vassek. He was killed by the Separatist General Grievous during their mission to the moon. He was killed when a trapdoor opened revealing a carbonite pit. He and Commander Fil both fell but the Commander reacted quick enough to save himself. This trooper didn't react in time and got incinerated in the pit. He was the last trooper besides Commander Fil.
